description: This file defines several UI components for a React Native app, including TopBar, FAB (Floating Action Button), NoteCard, and EmptyState, with associated styles.

methods.name: TopBar
methods.description: A top navigation bar component with optional left and right elements.

methods.name: FAB
methods.description: A floating action button that triggers onPress when tapped.

methods.name: NoteCard
methods.description: A card component displaying a note's title and content preview.

methods.name: EmptyState
methods.description: A component showing an emoji and message for empty states.
